tool_description: Generate a safe password that respects user specified constraints.
name: passwordGenerator
title: passwordGenerator

api_list.name: passwordGenerator
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://passwordgenerator.p.rapidapi.com/prod/passwordGenerator"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "passwordgenerator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
